item.description: Basic configuration # Testing out what’s possible to do for free When life gives you lemons, make lemonade. graph LR; A[Lemons]-->B[Lemonade]; B-->C[Profit] Sub heading # Sub sub heading # Call to action \(f(a,b,c) = (a^2+b^2+c^2)^3\)
